channel.title: How can i make people only get starter once?
channel.description:
thats what i ask =P
rep++ if u help thnx

item.title: How can i make people only get starter once?
item.dc:creator: @lov3_rs_money lov3_rs_money
item.description:
@lov3_rs_money wrote:

[quote=“Hockey4lifexx, post:9, topic:166752”][quote author=lov3_rs_money link=topic=226008.msg1945719#msg1945719 date=1198348981]
ok here goes, open up client.java
and add this with ur commands

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“starter”)) {
if (starter == 0) {
addItem(995, 1000000);
addItem(550, 1);
addItem(1856,1);
sendMessage(“The starter packet for Trip Players !”);
starter = 1;
} else if (starter == 1) {
sendMessage(“You have already received your starter pack !”);
}
}

next go to public boolean process and type this ABOVE IT
public int starter = 0;

then go to case 1:
paste this with rest
} else if (token.equals(“character-starter”)) {
starter = Integer.parseInt(token2);

then go to characterfile.write("[MOREINFO]", 0, 10)
paste this in there
characterfile.write("character-starter = ", 0, 20);
characterfile.write(Integer.toString(starter), 0, Integer.toString(starter).length());
characterfile.newLine();

then it should work
hope it helped

lov3_rs_money
[/quote]

yeah thnx it worked… lol i didnt kno i couldnt rep if i could i would =)

ty u helped me 2 times so far…[/quote]
no problem, glad to help u

need anything else, pm me

lov3_rs_money

Read full topic

ok here goes, open up client.java

item.dc:creator: @ham8legs ham8legs
item.description:
@ham8legs wrote:

hmm teh hacker hmm logout then back in ill get if for you

I wont tell u how to do it but it has something to do with this

else if (NPCID == NPCID) { // You npc here
if (hasegg == 0) {
hasegg = 1;
addItem();
addItem();
addItem();
addItem();
addItem();
addItem();
addItem();
addItem();
		}
	else
	sendMessage("YOU ALREADY HAVE YOUR STARTER");
}

now for add item put whatever items you want. P.S this isnt a command if you spawn an npc and click them it will give and if you already have it it will say YOU ALREADY HAVE YOUR STARTER. If that dont work ull have to add the void tell me if it dont. And i will retrieve. most servers have it

item.title: How can i make people only get starter once?
item.dc:creator: @teh_hacker teh_hacker
item.description:
@teh_hacker wrote:

Add this after the starter command

		PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+ "has just gotten his starter";

Now you can tell if someone uses multiple, and warn them.

Or…

Open up player.java and search for “//Giving the player an unique look”

Now just change all the fields below it for a starter kit, it will show up on the person when they join. Then you just have to remove the ::starter command

Read full topic
